text: Narciso Valentin Ticobay (19 March 1932 – 21 July 2013) was a Filipino Episcopalian bishop. He was the second Prime Bishop of the Episcopal Church in the Philippines from 1993 to 1997. He also served as the second Diocesan Bishop the EDSP from 1986–1993. He died in 2013 at the age of 81. ==References== ==External links== *ECP Elects New Prime Bishop, The Episcopal Diocese of Northern Central Philippines Official Website *Bishop Protests at Tutu's Inclusion on List of 'Troublemakers' *Memorial website Category:1932 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Filipino Episcopalians Category:Filipino bishops
title: Narciso Ticobay
